Summary: Tight Cluster Of Extreamly Large Bright Spears In Southern Night Sky
divs: Sighting Details1.) Sitting on front porch. 2.) At first it seemed to be a very bright star. 3.) After observing it and taking pictures, Noticed it was a small cluster of 4-6 extremely large and glowing spheres. 4.) Very constant motion. Moving from North to South until it vanished. 5.) I was convinced it was something not of this world even before taking the pictures. 6.) Object vanished under treeline.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Elkridge
There were no other sightings in Elkridge on or around October 27th 2013
